code: import{useEffect,useState}from'react';import API from'../api/api';import JobCard from'../components/JobCard';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Home(){const[jobs,setJobs]=useState([]);const[q,setQ]=useState('');const fetchJobs=async search=>{try{const res=await API.get('/jobs/search',{params:{q:search}});setJobs(res.data.results||[]);}catch(e){setJobs([]);}};useEffect(()=>{fetchJobs();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mx-auto p-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex gap-2 mb-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:q,onChange:e=>setQ(e.target.value),placeholder:"Search jobs",className:"border p-2 flex-1"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>fetchJobs(q),className:"px-4 py-2 bg-indigo-600 text-white rounded",children:"Search"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4",children:jobs.map(j=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(JobCard,{job:j},j.id))})]});}
